text: Decrepit Birth is an American death metal band formed in 2001. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * ...And Time Begins (2003) * Diminishing Between Worlds (2008) * Polarity (2010) * Axis Mundi (2017) ==References== Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Death metal bands Category:2001 establishments in California Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:Musical groups from California
title: Decrepit Birth
